version_description:
* Join the special race of Halloween!
Collect evil pumpkins and unlock mystery levels

* You asked for it and we listened – watch the #1 rider in tournaments!
Check out the champ's race and learn a trick or two

* Amazing new River level pack

* New girl on the block – give a warm welcome to the lady rider!
You can choose her in the customization menu

* Updated duel reward system

- Major physics improvement

- Festive Christmas event - collect mystery gifts that unlock amazing snowy Christmas levels, grant unique customization items and heaps of gold coins!

* All good things must end... Xmas event is over

* Joined a tournament and want to restart or improve your score? It's now cheaper than the original entry fee!

* We made it easier to find your stats in the leaderboards

* Updated prices for customization items

* Minor bug fixes

- "Revenge is a dish best served cold"
Seek revenge upon opponents who defeated you in duels by challenging them to a double-or-nothing! Now we'll see who the really brave riders are...

- New customization items for riders and bikes

- Minor bug fixes and improvements

- "Revenge is a dish best served cold"
Seek revenge upon opponents who defeated you in duels by challenging them to a double-or-nothing! Now we'll see who the really brave riders are...

- New customization items for riders and bikes

- Minor bug fixes and improvements

*After its big debut in the latest World Cup - the Stadium level pack is now available in the "Special Stages" section

*You can now record and share replays of your races!

*New customization items

*Minor bug fixes

*The Xtreme Xperience is now complete, with REAL CASH contests! Join real money duels and tournaments and turn your hobby into cash! Try them out for free

* Levels, levels everywhere! The new Russian style level pack awaits you in Special Stages

*Bug fixes and improvements

-Join the Xtreme subscription club! By subscribing, you will unlock all level packs, get access to all the bikes, enjoy increased prizes in duels and more! Make sure to check out all the sweet benefits of joining the Xtreme Club
-Think you’re the ultimate Level Master? Prove it! Race against the world’s top players to enter the Level Master leaderboard for each of the Trial Xtreme 4 levels and win eternal fame and glory!
-Make your duel opponents shiver with fear as they can now see your best score in the level you’re dueling in! Now even when you do an “okay” round, everyone will still know your true ability…

*Think you can control your bike well? now it's the time to test your skills on the new awesome ride - The Mountain Board!

*Race in an all new Brazilian inspired level pack with the landscape of beautiful RIO DE JANEIRO.

*Hope you are not scared, because flying pumpkins and walking skeletons are just a part of the new Halloween pack. collect pumpkins throughout the game to unlock all levels, customize your bike and rider in a new cool Halloween designs. Make haste! unlock all of the Halloween levels before they will disappear, the clock is ticking...

*Come and race in the MAGICAL North Pole, Christmas trees and Santa's elves are just a part of this beautiful merry pack.

*Whether you've been naughty or good, it doesn't make any difference, win duels to receive special gifts from Santa.

*Customize your bike and rider according to holiday spirit. Hurry now SANTA is waiting for you.

*Added 6 new levels to "Russia" level pack
*Bug fixes and improvements

*Easter bunny has a a present for you-all level packs are now open for 1 week!!!
*Brand new Easter outfit!

*A Brand new Xtremely hard level pack-Yes,we played it...Yes,the levels can be beaten...No its not easy....

*Added 5 brand new levels to Thailand level pack

*Re-designed the main menu,now its easier to get around.

*Re-deigned the bike shop-we decided to give it a new look and feel :)

*Hope you are not scared, because flying pumpkins and walking skeletons are just a part of the Halloween pack. collect pumpkins throughout the game to unlock all Haloween levels, customize your bike and rider in cool Halloween designs

*Minor bug fixes and improvements

*Christmas time is here, and its time for another great update!
win duels to get chests with amazing prizes, christmas levels for free, free shirts, free helmets and variety of customizations and bike parts.

*A special daily promotion, each day you will get a different amazing offer inside the game, make sure not to miss them!
